string_table:
AK-47
The Kalashnikov automatic rifle model 1947 using the cartridge 7.62x39mm. A simple and reliable weapon, although the cheapness before the production somewhat had effect on convenience in utilisation and precision of combat. In the Zone this sufficiently rare weapon because of its absence in arsenal of army. 
 the ammunition: 
 common 7.62x39mm, 
 armour-piercing 7.62x39mm AP.
Armour-piercing cartridge for the automatic machines AK47 and AK104T. Improved armour-piercing ability of bullet.
Standard cartridge for the automatic machines AK47 and AK104T. Simple core, tunicary bullet.

Basic cartridge for pistols Desert Eagle, Colt 1911, SIG 220, USP. A simple core shell bullet.
Hydra-Shock - cartridge with improved characteristics for handguns Desert Eagle, Colt 1911, SIG 220, USP. Expansionary bullet which has good stopping power.
A standard 12 calibre round filled with 6 mm shot. It has an enormous killing power at a close range. It is designed for the BM 17, the Chaser 13 and the SPSA14 shotguns. It is most effective at ranges under 30 meters.
A finned bullet. It can stabilize in flight, which increases its accuracy. It is designed for the TOS 34, the BM 17, Chaser 13 and the SPSA14 shotguns. It has an armor-piercing effect and an increased range. It is effective at a range of up to 150 meters.
A round with a heavy naked bullet. It is usually used for big game hunting, but can be used for other purposes. Its heavy bullet does not pierce but actually forces itself through bulletproof vests. It is designed for the TOS 34, the BM 17, the Chaser 13 and the SPSA14 shotguns. It is effective at a range of up to 100 meters.
An armor-piercing round for the Akm 74/2, the Akm 74/2U and the ON-94 assault rifles. It has an improved armor-piercing effect, but a decreased stopping effect.
A standard round for the Akm 74/2, the Akm 74/2U and the Obokan assault rifles. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet.
A round with an armor-piercing bullet for the IL 86, the TRs 301, the SGI 5k, the GP 37 and the FT 200M assault rifles.
A standard NATO round widely-known under its Belgian SS109 index. It is used with the IL 86, the TRs 301, the SGI 5k, the GP 37 and the FT 200M assault rifles.
Gross up-to-date 7.62mm rifle cartridge for the sniper rifles of SVD and SVU-ACE. 
 Pulya of 7N13, in spite of similar down the sniper ammunition ballistic data, has sufficiently great (on the sniper requirements) dispersion even on the average distances; however, it possesses the increased penetration effect due to the introduction beside the construction of the bullet of armour-piercing core through the hardened tool steel.
A sniper round for the SVDm 2 and the SVUmk2 sniper rifles. It has an improved accuracy and range.
7N1 (TsP) - authorised sniper cartridge for the rifles of SVD, THE SVU-ACE also of machine gun PKM. 
 Nesmotrya down the fact that 7N1 is accepted for the armament in 1967, it 2-3 times exceeds up-to-date gross 7N13 about the indicators of dispersion. But because of the application of the blunt-ended stamped core through steel 10, bullet TsP does not possess high breakdown properties.
A standard round for the PMm, PB1s, Fort-12Mk2 pistols. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet. It has a weak armor-piercing effect.
Cartridge with the improved ballistic data for the pistols PM, PB, Fort 12. Due to the higher initial velocity of bullet it is considerably more effective than the common cartridge. More expressed armour-piercing effect.
Base cartridge for the pistol type walther type P99 and submachine gun HK MP5K-N. Tunicary bullet. Weak armour-piercing activity.
Cartridge with the improved characteristicss for the pistol type walther type P99 and submachine gun HK MP5K- N. Powerful cartridge with the expansive bullet and the armour-piercing core.
Armour-piercing cartridge for the automatic machines 'Thunderstorm', 'Shaft', and VSS 'thread cutter'. Due to the armour-piercing bullet of special construction will punch through any bulletproof vest even at the maximum distance. However, it has greater dispersion than sniper 9x39 CP -5.
Cartridge for the automatic machinegun 'Thunderstorm'. The cheaper before the manufacture modification of the cartridge of 9x39, fits also ACE 'shaft' and VSS 'thread cutter', but rapidly it drives in them.
Specially developed sniper cartridge for the automatic machineguns 'Thunderstorm', 'Shaft' and VSS 'thread cutter'. Excellent characteristics.
Energy capacities with finished lethal 9mm by elements for the rifle of Gauss (10 pieces in the magazine). The energy source is the encapsulated fragment of artifact "Flash".
Shot for the under-barrel grenade launcher M-203 (LR300, SIG 550, HK G36) and for the integrated grenade launcher FN type F2000.
HE fragmentation shot for RPG-7V. It is equally effective both against the personnel and against legkobronirovanoy equipment.
Shot for the under-barrel grenade launcher OF GP-25 'Bonfire', integrated grenade launcher 'Thunderstorm' and revolver grenade launcher RG-6.
Shot for the under-barrel grenade launcher OF GP-25 'Bonfire', integrated grenade launcher 'Thunderstorm' and revolver grenade launcher RG-6. Before the burst the shot jumps down the height about the metre, which increases its damage effect.
Hand defensive grenade with the great effective casualty radius by fragments. Thrown it should be only from cover.
Hand smoke grenade. It is intended for the installation of smoke cover. Time of action - 10 seconds.
Offensive hand grenade with the small effective casualty radius by fragments.
Ammunition: 
 • 5.45x39 - basic 
 • 5.45x39 AP - armour-piercing 
 Avtomat type Nikonov 'Abakan' (An-94) model 1994 on the base of the system of Kalashnikov. It was came out as the replacement of obsolete AK-74. Before 'Abakan' are mobile not only internal mechanisms, but also entire receiver group together with the gun, which makes it possible to decrease output, thus having considerably raised the precision of combat.
Ammunition: 
 • 5.45x39 - basic 
 • 5.45x39 AP - armour-piercing 
 AN-94 'Abakan', provided by 3x-multiple optical sight for conducting the sniper fire. Built-in beside the corps optics possesses greater multiplicity than standard sights.

 integrated grenade launcher for the rifles, produced in the NATO alliance countries.
Widely distributed PSO-1 (sight sniper optical) of Soviet production. For the installation down the weapon is used fastening of the type dovetail standard in the countries of the Warsaw Pact.
Sight sniper 4x-multiple 'Susat L9A1', produced in the NATO alliance countries. For the installation down the weapon is used the standard NATO fastening, named the plank type Picatinny.
PBS - silencer, assembled in the Zone by some skillful individuals. With it before the set of attending the framing of perexodinikov under the weapon of any calibre.

 Avtomat of the Kalashnikov of collapsible shortened (AKS-74U) of model 1974. Before its dimensions and mass AKS-74U it is close down the submachine guns; however, the operating principle of the mechanism of this weapon and the cartridge used before it make for the sake of its representative of the class of automatic machines. The advantages include low dimensions, which is extremely useful with conducting of combat due to the urban conditions, and sufficiently high punching ability of cartridge. Central failures - low sighting range and tendency down to the rapid superheating with the fire in bursts.
Ammunition - 
 • 5.45x39mm - basic 
 • 5.45x39mm AP - armour-piercing 
 Modification of base version. It is said this automatic machine was found before the heap of rusty iron beyond Garbage, moreover against that place itself, where three months 'strand' gravity anomaly. It is however strange, ACE proved to be before the excellent condition, and the stay before the anomaly had effect on it by the surprising mode: bullets released of this weapon possess considerably greater energy. It is furnished for the sake of tight silencer.

 Sostoit in arsenal of the Vooruzhennyx forces and police of the USA, many militarised and law-enforcement formings in the entire world. It is so popular in the representatives of criminal peace because of the powerful cartridge and the great capacity of magazine.
Newest modification type M9 - American version of this weapon. is characterised by gun manufactured with the help of most up-to-date technologies, as a result of which considerably they were improved precision and lethal activity of weapon.

 Heckler and Koch type g36 - assault rifle of German production, which is the sufficiently good model of up-to-date weapon - lung and ergonomic. This model lay long time before the anomaly 'Jelly' and gained unique properties - seriously was increased destructive power and firing distance. In addition to this, the model is equipped for the sake of the integrated NATO rifle grenade launcher under the shot M-203.
Modification of base version. Even series G36 is one of the best assault rifles in the Zone. But also so high combat characteristicss it was possible to considerably improve. Someone from the grouping 'Monolith' was conjectured to grind an artifact 'Gravi', and the obtained powder to rub beside the external and internal surfaces of gun. The considerable increase of lethal force and precision became result. 
 ammunition:

 M72-M the rifle of Gauss - cverxtochnoe weapon, which they gathered and modernized in the mobile laboratory of scientists. It works almost noiselessly, since energy of artifacts,, but not powder gases is used for the firing. In spite of the colossal power of shot, output in the rifle of Gauss is very small. Any classical small arms exceeds on the precision and the lethal force. Complete ignoring of put on bronizhileta.

 Enfield type l85 A2. After this rifle was replaced as far as the UK Army down German HK type g36, it before the large numbers floated up on the Black Market, and then in the Zone. The main advantage type enfield type l85 A2 are the authorised 4x- multiple optical sight "Of susat L9A1" and the high precision of the first shot.  sniper rifle shortened automatic folding (SVU-ACE). The modern indoor compact version SVD, carried out according to the scheme 'of bull-pup' (scheme before which magazine and mechanisms are located behind the control handle besides fire). The advantage of this scheme consists before the fact that with the relatively greater length of gun the weapon remains compact. 
 it is very good before the remote journeys through the zone, however, in comparison with SVD, it nevertheless suffers an increase in the average dispersion, which limits effective fire range to the average distances.
Modification of base version. If we believe to stalker stories, SVU once belonged to experimental stalker on the nickname little-one (this person was actually small growth and in no way Herculean build). It itself altered its SVU, having considerably lightened it and after equipping for the sake of the compensator of output.

 Version sniper special 'thread cutter' (VSS 'thread cutter'), is intended for the noiseless and flameless sniper firing and is furnished for the sake of the integrated 'silencer'. For the self defence is envisaged the regime of automatic fire; however, sufficiently it is rapidly driven in by carbon deposit. In spite of this, at the point of compactness, precision, high efficiency and possibility to conduct direct fire 'shed' greatly is valued by the stalker of any level.
Modification of base version with larger-capacity magazine and unique optics. 'Thread cutter' with the grant label from nobody Sergey Tixy's stalker. No one in the Zone remembers nothing about the origin of this weapon - apparently, its real owner has long ago been dead. The surprising property of this rifle - its bullet they fly with the greater velocity across the more straight direct trajectory.

This model underwent the lasting effect of radiation, after lying half a year in the anomalous Zone down Chernobyl, and it gained unique properties before the plan of the increased wear resistance, rate of fire, destructive power and precision of firing.

Beretta M9A1
The homemade flamethrower by the construction of Svobodov for Screw. It is charged for the sake of two-component mixture from the colloidal gas 'F' and the petroleum products. Mixture self-ignites in air; therefore construction is maximally simple. However, the details, manufactured based on highly technological anticorrosive materials, received due to the particular laboratory conditions, are applied because of the high chemical activity of mixture before the construction. Moreover only screw, masters the listening post of the production of mixture. At the point of these reasons the flamethrower did not become mass article, in spite of the very serious advantages over the common firearms with the rendezvous with some inhabitants of Zone.

Flamethrower

 the machine guns of a series PK / OF RMB are characterised by high reliability and enjoy the deserved popularity before the troops, disregarding besides a somewhat pereuslozhnennuyu two-stage feed system of cartridges besides the tape beside the gun. Barrel quick-change, has a carrying handle, also utilised for replacing the hot gun. Feed by cartridges - from the nerassypnoy metallic tape with the closed team. The authorised capacity of belts is 100 (before the manual version) cartridges. The direction of belt feed - from right to left, ports for supply and emergence of tape are equipped for the sake of dust caps as port for the blowout of the spent cases. The supply of cartridges from the tape two-stage - first special capture with the recoil of zavtornoy frame extracts cartridge from the tape ago, after which cartridge descends down the line of ramming and with the counterrecoil of breechblock is rammed home beside the gun. Firing is conducted based on the discovered breechblock, only by automatic fire. Standard controls before the infantry version include pistol handle, trigger, manual safety device and frame butt.

 the Belgian submachine gun, came out before 1980 - X years by the firm FN type herstal. In spite of unusual exterior view, is sufficiently effective. For FN type p90 was came out the special cartridge of 5.7x28mm SS190, which possesses greater breakdown power than other pistol cartridges. This bullet develops muzzle velocity to 715 metres per second and is capable of clearing the majority of bulletproof vests. It is convenient before the application, it has extremely weak output. Magazine is located on top, capacity - 50 cartridges.
FN P90
The 5.7x28mm cartridge is a small caliber, high velocity cartridge created by FN Herstal in Belgium in conjunction with the FN P90 personal defense weapon (PDW) and FN Five-Seven pistol. Developed in response to NATO requests for a replacement for 9x19mm Parabellum, the 5.7x28mm is a bottlenecked centerfire cartridge that is somewhat similar to the .22 Hornet or .22 K-Hornet. The SS190 FMJ, a refinement of the SS90, was introduced in 1993. It offered superior performance over the prototype projectile as well as slightly reduced length. This bullet develops a muzzle velocity of 715 metres per second and is capable of penetrating bulletproof vests.
